Desc.entry: A multifaceted bowling club with teams in juniors, womens, mens and veterans leagues. Has around 90 members male and female aged 10-92 years and welcomes new members either of social or league standard. Plays on Sheffield City Council's Parks and Recreation Department owned greens and has responsibility of upkeep and maintenance of the greens and surrounding areas thus ensuring excellent playing surfaces.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Key is needed to access disabled parking area
